Posts.Content: Agnes wrote: Hi all, I was just diagnosed with IDC on 10/26 and I was able to get a surgery date for 11/12 for a double masectomy. However, when they were checking my vitals they discovered I had a heart murmer. I had an echocardiogram today and am waiting for the results. I'm so worried it will interfere with the surgery. Has this happened to anyone else? Dx 10/26/2018, IDC, Right, 1cm, Stage IA, Grade 2, 0/4 nodes, ER+/PR+, HER2- Surgery 11/12/2018 Mastectomy: Right; Prophylactic mastectomy: Left Hormonal Therapy Tamoxifen pills (Nolvadex, Apo-Tamox, Tamofen, Tamone) Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Double Masectomy and heart murmur. Agnes NancyD

Posts.Content: Nov 7, 2018 08:03PM Agnes wrote: Thank you heart murmur club! I was so worried about being cleared for the surgery and they told me today that I am ok to have it. Such a relief. Thanks for your encouraging words!
Posts.Title: Double Masectomy and heart murmur. Agnes NancyD
